laboratory_examinations.findings: Revealed a deleterious germ line BRCA2 mutation.
Detected a new 8-mm nonpalpable mass in the lower inner retroareolar region of the left breast which represented infiltrating ductal carcinoma.
laboratory_examinations.changes_over_time: New mass detected compared to previous mammographic findings.

laboratory_examinations.findings: Mass represented infiltrating ductal carcinoma with a different hormone receptor profile (first cancer was progesterone receptor positive, second was progesterone receptor negative).
Mastectomy of the left breast revealed no other sites of malignant disease or metastatic disease in the lymph nodes.
